fields.name: CreationDate
fields.description: The creation date of the elastic pool (ISO8601 format).

fields.name: HighAvailabilityReplicaCount
fields.description: The number of secondary replicas associated with the elastic pool that are used to provide high availability. Applicable only to Hyperscale elastic pools.

fields.name: LicenseType
fields.description: The license type to apply for this elastic pool.

fields.name: MaintenanceConfigurationId
fields.description: Maintenance configuration id assigned to the elastic pool. This configuration defines the period when the maintenance updates will will occur.

fields.name: MaxSizeBytes
fields.description: The storage limit for the database elastic pool in bytes.

fields.name: MinCapacity
fields.description: Minimal capacity that serverless pool will not shrink below, if not paused

fields.name: PerDatabaseSettings
fields.description: The per database settings for the elastic pool.

fields.name: State
fields.description: The state of the elastic pool.

fields.name: ZoneRedundant
fields.description: Whether or not this elastic pool is zone redundant, which means the replicas of this elastic pool will be spread across multiple availability zones.
